{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-883 |revision=A1 |asin=B0711TPWZY |fcc_date=03/24/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=new |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR883A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR883A1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065;IPQ8065, 0VV, FK6354PB, K063500; |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABBEAH4-IT:E |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25U3235F |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NK641CVV, K064100; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NK641CVV, K064100; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, PK640B8P, 1640, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, VHT160, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Covr AC2600 Seamless Wi-Fi Router}} Renamed as the ''Covr AC2600 Seamless Wi-Fi Router (COVR-2600R)'' *[http://us.dlink.com/press-centre/press-releases/covr/ ''New D-Link Covr Wi-Fi System Delivers Seamless High-Power Wi-Fi
Throughout Entire Home'' on '''D-Link (US)'''] Part of the [http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/covr-ac3900-whole-home-wi-fi-system/ ''Covr AC3900 Whole Home Wi-Fi System (COVR-3902)''] including: * Covr AC2600 Seamless Wi-Fi Router (COVR-2600R) * Covr AC1300 Seamless Wi-Fi Range Extender (COVR-1300E) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.techhive.com/article/3153887/network-router/d-links-covr-home-networking-line-router-with-wireless-powerline-extenders.html ''D-Link’s Covr home networking line pairs a high-end router with
wireless and powerline range extenders'' on '''TechHive'''] :'''D-Link Covr AC3900 Whole Home Wi-Fi System (COVR-3902)''' :The Covr Wi-Fi Kit (DKT-883) consists of a :*[[D-Link DIR-883 rev A1]] - ''AC2600 MU-MIMO Dual-band Router'' and :*[[D-Link DAP-1655 rev A1]] - ''AC1300 Gigabit Wi-FI Extender'' ===See also=== :*[[D-Link DHP-W732AV]] - ''Covr PowerLine AV2 1300 Adapter''
